product_name: Shimano SH-WF23 Bike Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for indoor spin classes and outdoor recreational rides, the women's Shimano SH-WF23 Bike Shoes feature a women-specific shape for a natural, comfortable fit. Highly ventilated mesh uppers and outsoles keep feet cool and dry. EVA nonmarking outsoles are comfortable and gym friendly. Exclusive shank-plate stiffener lets the outsole flex for comfortable walking. Interior is designed to feel comfortable without socks. Integrated rip-and-stick strap holds laces in place. Shimano SH-WF23 Bike Shoes for women are SPD cleat compatible (cleats not included). Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for indoor spin classes and outdoor recreational rides, the women's Shimano SH-WF23 Bike Shoes feature a women-specific shape for a natural, comfortable fit.
